medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sudden onset sharp pain midline in the epigastric region at 4 pm yesterday. By 11 pm, the pain migrated to the periumbilical region. The pain was constant, exacerbated by movement, and alleviated by remaining still and sitting with hips flexed. The patient was able to sleep through the night, but the pain persisted the following morning while walking to work.
medical_history.family_history: No history of abdominal disease in the family.
